name: They'll Never Know What Hit Them!

system.typeAndAction:
Basic Order
Half or Full Action
system.requirements:
.Ratling, Ratling Comrade, Stealth +10.
Apt: Agility, Fieldcraft
system.descriptionText: Comrade in Cohesion spends a Half Action, or Full Action if their Character has made an attack since the beginning of their last Turn. All Attempts to spot the character or their Comrade suffer -20 during any round this order is enacted. Can be enacted out of combat, in which case it is maintained until Comrade ceases to work on maintaining it for whatever reason.
